title: WTB: T205 Gibson (HLC, PB or AB)
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Gibson (HLC, PB or AB)
posts.post_content:
Greetings folks,

Would love to add some T205s to my slowly growing Gibson back run. The backs that I'm aware of that I don't yet have are:

Honest Long Cut
Polar Bear
American Beauty

Now I know that last one is a long shot, but the other two can't be *that* difficult, can they? Anyway, I'm not looking for anything super high grade, just presentable, preferably with no paper loss (chipping and creases aren't much of a problem for me). If you have anything for sale (and accept PayPal) please let me know!

Thanks,

Richard.
Good luck on the AB. Seen one about 10yrs ago and been looking since. Would pay some good money if it ever surfaced again.

[quote name="T205 GB" post=1372639]Good luck on the AB. Seen one about 10yrs ago and been looking since. Would pay some good money if it ever surfaced again.[/QUOTE]

There was one on eBay back in about 2008. I think a lot of us saw it and passed. I know it was listed a few times. I'm guessing if another one surfaces there's going to be a lineup of people interested, but it won't stop me from asking ;)

Here's hoping I can at least get one of the others I'm looking for.

Cheers,

Richard.
